Title: Romeo and Juliet
Writer: Renato Castellani (adaptated for the screen by)
Actors: Laurence Harvey, Susan Shentall, Flora Robson, Norman Wooland
Plot: In Shakespeare's classic play, the Montagues and Capulets, two families of Renaissance Italy, have hated each other for years, but the son of one family and the daughter of the other fall desperately in love and secretly marry.
Awards: Nominated for 3 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 6 wins & 2 nominations.
